text: Halli inna inling olive abaak lekkhat ngaikha akiakjei halli ramma kamoong Olive thingkuung bakkha khawakhan inminjomjei. Khawajarra nangni zaatlop ngai-um ramma kamoong olive thingkuung ka-ang ning eii, halli atuunchu ningni'n Jihudi ngai Ratha lamtiang jetna kacheet ringkhuo kha ningchan ejei.
